large no. of seeders mean good health/quality of torrent=fast DL speed=smile on your face=popularity of original up-loader.

1st of all when u done with your DL. as u said it changed from "downloading" to "seeding" that's called seeding and u don't have to do any thing extra. 
 2nd it (utorrent) will only seed particular items/movie which you has just finished therefore no threat/harm to your hard disk data. 

SOME EXTRA INFO
when you done with Ur downloading and you wanna change your DOWNLOADED MOVIES location and you wanna seed also.
suppose u moved 'jeb we met' from 'drive C' to 'drive E' and u wanna still seed it.
now run Ur jeb we met torrent file again and this time select location drive E it will check and seed.
but remember next time when u run any other torrent file plz check/select Drive C or wherever u wanna download.otherwise it will always go to Drive E.
